pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains built wheels for xylib by Marcin Wojdyr (https://github.com/wojdyr/xylib)xylib is a library for reading obscure file formats with data frompowder diffraction, spectroscopy and other experimental methods.For the list of supported formats see https://github.com/wojdyr/xylib .This module includes bindings to xylib and xylib itself.The first two numbers in the version are the version of included xylib.
